frontmatter.title: DataContext
frontmatter.description: `DataContext` interweaves your data-set with your form fields.

frontmatter.title: Form
frontmatter.description: `Form` provides the main forms-helpers including data provider and event handling.

frontmatter.title: Value
frontmatter.description: `Value` components can be used to summarize any kind of data.

frontmatter.title: Wizard
frontmatter.description: `Wizard` is a set of components for showing forms with a [StepIndicator](/uilib/components/step-indicator/) for navigation between several wizard. It also includes components for navigating between wizard.
